entries.name: context
entries.desc: Returns the current context of this irb session

entries.name: scanner
entries.desc: The lexer used by this irb session

entries.name: inspect()
entries.desc: Outputs the local variables to this current session, including signal_status and context, using IRB::Locale.

entries.name: signal_handle()
entries.desc: Handler for the signal SIGINT, see Kernel#trap for more information.

entries.name: signal_status(status)
entries.desc: Evaluates the given block using the given status.

entries.name: suspend_context(context)
entries.desc: Evaluates the given block using the given context as the Context.

entries.name: suspend_input_method(input_method)
entries.desc: Evaluates the given block using the given input_method as the IRB::Context#io.

entries.name: suspend_name(path = nil, name = nil)
entries.desc: Evaluates the given block using the given path as the IRB::Context#irb_path and name as the IRB::Context#irb_name.

entries.name: suspend_workspace(workspace)
entries.desc: Evaluates the given block using the given workspace as the IRB::Context#workspace.
